review: It MUST have an electrical outlet nearby!  Pictures could be a bit misleading in that they only show the remote and stick, not the AC adapter that it must have for power.  Performance wise, it is pretty good!
author: Amazon Customer

review: This little device is awesome.  It's rock solid and reliable operation makes it a joy to use.  I've been using two Apple TVs and a Roku HD in our home for about two years now, and there is absolutely no comparison.  Simple, elegant, fast and reliable are the descriptives that come to mind regarding the Fire Stick.  Highly recommended!
author: Amazon Customer
